import React from "react" import { Table, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from "reactstrap" import classnames from "classnames" import { Eye, Code } from "react-feather" import { tableStriped } from "./TableSourceCode" class TableStriped extends React.Component { state = { activeTab: "1" } toggleTab = tab => { if (this.state.activeTab !== tab) { this.setState({ activeTab: tab }) } } render() { return ( Striped
{ this.toggleTab("1") }} > { this.toggleTab("2") }} >

Use prop striped with table tag for striped table.

# First Name Last Name Username
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
{tableStriped} ) } } export default TableStriped
